sentences:
Further Down the Spiral is the second remix album by American industrial rock band Nine Inch Nails .
It is the companion remix disc to the band ’s second studio album , The Downward Spiral , and was released on June 1 , 1995 in two editions , one denoted as Halo 10 ( released in the United States and in the United Kingdom on the morning of release , to be pulled and replaced with Halo 10 V2 by lunch time ) and the other as Halo 10 V2 ( released in Japan , Australia , and the UK ) , each containing a different set of tracks .
The album was certified gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) on June 26 , 1996 , denoting sales in excess of 500,000 copies in the US .
Further Down the Spiral showed a more varied and experimental point of view to the original and boasted many high - profile remixers and contributors including Aphex Twin , JG Thirlwell , Rick Rubin with Dave Navarro and Coil with Danny Hyde .
The discs include remixes of " Mr. Self Destruct " , " Piggy " , " Hurt " , " Eraser " , " The Downward Spiral " , " Heresy " , " Reptile " , and " Ruiner " , as well as two original compositions by Aphex Twin .
